hanabAI

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanabAI.Action

  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class to represent actions in the game Hanabi. The class is designed to be immutable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        private Action(int player,
               java.lang.String playerName,
               ActionType type)

      • Action

        public Action(int player,
              java.lang.String playerName,
              ActionType type,
              int pos)
       throws IllegalActionException
        Constructor to create Play or Discard actions
        Parameters:
        player - the index of the player performing the action
        playerName - the naem of the player performing the action
        type - the type of the action, should be ActionType.PLAY or actionType.DISCARD
        pos - the position of the card to be discarded in the players hand
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the wrong ActionType is given

      • Action

        public Action(int player,
              java.lang.String playerName,
              ActionType type,
              int hintReceiver,
              boolean[] cards,
              Colour hint)
       throws IllegalActionException
        Constructor to create Play or Discard actions
        Parameters:
        player - the index of the player performing the action
        playerName - the naem of the player performing the action
        type - the type of the action, must be ActionType.HINT_COLOUR
        hintReceiver - the index of the player recieving the hint
        cards - an array of booleans, such that the ith value is true if and only if the ith card in the hintee's hand matches the hint
        hint - the colour hinted at.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the wrong ActionType is given

      • Action

        public Action(int player,
              java.lang.String playerName,
              ActionType type,
              int hintReceiver,
              boolean[] cards,
              int hint)
       throws IllegalActionException
        Constructor to create Play or Discard actions
        Parameters:
        player - the index of the player performing the action
        playerName - the naem of the player performing the action
        type - the type of the action, must be ActionType.HINT_VALUE
        hintReceiver - the index of the player recieving the hint
        cards - an array of booleans, such that the ith value is true if and only if the ith card in the hintee's hand matches the hint
        hint - the value hinted at.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the wrong ActionType is given

      • getCard

        public int getCard()
            throws IllegalActionException
        gets the psoition of the card being played/discarded
        Returns:
        the position of the card being played or discarded
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the action type is not PLAY or DISCARD

      • getHintReceiver

        public int getHintReceiver()
                    throws IllegalActionException
        gets the index ofthe player receiving the hint
        Returns:
        the index of the player receiving the hint
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the action type is not HINT_COLOUR or HINT_VALUE

      • getHintedCards

        public boolean[] getHintedCards()
                         throws IllegalActionException
        gets an array of booleans indicating the cards that are the subject of the hint
        Returns:
        an array of booleans, such that the ith valeu is true if and only if the ith card in the hintReceivers hand matches the hint (indexing from 0)
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the action type is not HINT_COLOUR or HINT_VALUE

      • getColour

        public Colour getColour()
                 throws IllegalActionException
        gets the colour hinted
        Returns:
        the colour hinted
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the action type is not HINT_COLOUR

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
             throws IllegalActionException
        gets the value hinted
        Returns:
        the value hinted
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if the action type is not HINT_VALUE

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A string representation of the action being performed
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a description of the action, depending on type
